sentences.en: A fir is an evergreen tree with needlelike leaves that grows especially in cold areas.
sentences.cn: 冷杉是一种针叶常绿树,尤在寒冷地区生长.

sentences.en: Bolman has studied regional variation in Douglas fir seed yields.
sentences.cn: 鲍尔曼曾研究过道格拉斯冷杉种子产量地区间的差异.

sentences.en: CCS prepared in the FIR filter the source, as subroutine call.
sentences.cn: 在CCS下编写的FIR滤波器产生的源程序, 可以作为子程序调用.

sentences.en: China fir from Chinese mainland are used here in reforestation work.
sentences.cn: 该地用中国大陆的杉木以更新森林.

sentences.en: Copy PS _ A 610 . FIR to the root folder of SD card using your cardreader.
sentences.cn: 如果你有读卡器,就把PS_A610. FIR文件复制到SD卡的根目录.

sentences.en: Digital filter FIR is applied into the repetitive control strategy.
sentences.cn: 将FIR数字 滤波应用于本重复控制器信号电源中.

sentences.en: Mapped the FIR digital filter design of amplitude frequency characteristic curve.
sentences.cn: 绘出设计的FIR数字滤波幅频特性曲线.

sentences.en: Simple fir digital filter source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 简单的FIR数字滤波器的源代码的完整性, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: The box is made out of China fir wood.
sentences.cn: 这盒子是用杉木做成的.

sentences.en: The growth of spruce and fir needles is determinate.
sentences.cn: 云杉和冷杉的针叶生长是有限的.

sentences.en: The jeep skirted a small stand of pine and fir trees.
sentences.cn: 吉普车绕过一片松柏树林.

sentences.en: The most common construction woods are Douglas fir, hemlock, spruce, pine, and some cedar.
sentences.cn: 最常用的木料是道格拉斯冷杉, 铁杉, 云杉, 松木以及其他一些杉木.

sentences.en: This is a very small fir tree decorated with silver paper and colored lights.
sentences.cn: 也就是用银纸和彩灯装饰起来的小冷杉树.

sentences.en: Using assembly language can be prepared by the procedure FIR filter function.
sentences.cn: 用汇编语言编写的可实现FIR滤波器功能的程序.

sentences.en: Using window function design FIR filter, given in response to its sample.
sentences.cn: 利用窗函数法设计FIR滤波器, 给出其抽样响应.

trans.tran_cn: food-irradiation reactor 食物辐射（杀菌）用反应堆，firkin 弗京

trans.tran_en: a tree with leaves shaped like needles that do not fall off in winter
